commands.name: az networkfabric fabric commit-configuration
commands.summary: Atomic update of the given Network Fabric instance. Sync update of NFA resources at Fabric level.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric fabric commit-configuration [--ids]
                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--resource-name]
                                             [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric create
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric fabric create --fabric-asn
                               --ipv4-prefix
                               --managed-network-config
                               --nf-sku
                               --nfc-id
                               --resource-group
                               --resource-name
                               --server-count-per-rack
                               --ts-config
                               [--annotation]
                               [--fabric-version]
                               [--ipv6-prefix]
                               [--location]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--rack-count]
                               [--tags]
examples:
az networkfabric fabric create --ts-config "??"
az networkfabric fabric create --managed-network-config "{infrastructureVpnConfiguration:??"
az networkfabric fabric create --managed-network-config "{infrastructureVpnConfiguration:{option-b-properties:??"

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric delete
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric fabric delete [--ids]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--resource-name]
                               [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric deprovision
commands.summary: Deprovisions the underlying resources in the given Network Fabric instance.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric fabric deprovision [--ids]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--resource-name]
                                    [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric list
commands.summary: List all Network Fabrics in the provided resource group or subscription.

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric provision
commands.summary: Provisions the underlying resources in the given Network Fabric instance.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric fabric provision [--ids]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--resource-name]
                                  [--subscription]

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric show
commands.summary: Show details of the provided Network Fabric resource.

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric update
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric fabric update [--annotation]
                               [--fabric-asn]
                               [--ids]
                               [--ipv4-prefix]
                               [--ipv6-prefix]
                               [--managed-network-config]
                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                               [--rack-count]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--resource-name]
                               [--server-count-per-rack]
                               [--subscription]
                               [--tags]
                               [--ts-config]
examples:
az networkfabric fabric update --ts-config "??"
az networkfabric fabric update --managed-network-config "{infrastructureVpnConfiguration:??"
az networkfabric fabric update --managed-network-config "{infrastructureVpnConfiguration:{option-b-properties:??"

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric upgrade
commands.summary: Upgrades the version of the underlying resources in the given Network Fabric instance.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric fabric upgrade [--action {Complete, Start}]
                                [--ids]
                                [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                [--resource-group]
                                [--resource-name]
                                [--subscription]
                                [--version]

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric validate-configuration
commands.summary: Validates the configuration of the underlying resources in the given Network Fabric instance.
commands.syntax:
az networkfabric fabric validate-configuration [--ids]
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--resource-name]
                                               [--subscription]
                                               [--validate-action {Cabling, Configuration, Connectivity}]

commands.name: az networkfabric fabric wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
